item.title: 1. Know your group and your goals
item.description:
1. Know your group and your goals

Every year, as marching season approaches, you struggle to come up with a marching band show concept that will help you attain your program goals, motivate your students, entertain your audiences, and impress your judges.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Dwayne. I live in Los Angeles, but grew up in Texas and have lived in NYC.

item.title: Every musician should compose. 10 Steps to masterpiece.
item.description:
Every musician should compose. 10 Steps to masterpiece.

The Process

Music composition is to music what story writing is to literature, or painting is to art.  It is the sharing of a story or idea, no matter how abstract, between composer, performers, and audience.
